titleStmt.title: J.P., the follower of the Lamb, to the shepheards flock salutation, grace, and peace is with you in the spirit of power and life and be infinitely multiplyed unto you, amen.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

notesStmt.note: Written by John Perrot. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Friends' Library, London.
